apercu: Article temporaire 21 pour tester la base-de-données.
description: Article theoretically and empirically examines determinants of the levels of transparency in Local Governments based on the agency and legitimacy theories. For the purpose of this study, the analysis is based on the Spanish municipalities over a period of 4 years....

citation: The crisis has impact on Government forcing it to be more transparent in management of public resources.
